name: Infinite Phosphorous Flame VR
description:
Infinite Phosphorous Flame VR Is a VR puzzle game featuring an infinite set of puppetmasters who control those below them. Manipulate your world and a puzzlebox world of your own (floating at your chest level) to solve puzzles! Light the great brazier in the end to win!

Unfortunately, this game is playable in VR only. Maybe next time I'll set up a reusable hybrid system for non-VR play!

Continuous move and rotate with sticks. Grab elements of the puzzle box at your chest to manipulate your world. Or, bring elements of your world into the puzzlebox miniature world!

I built this for the OpenXR standard in Unity, but there's a chance this might not work non-Oculus headsets, please leave a comment if this doesn't work for your headset! Check out the gameplay video!
